Name: Revived Forest
About the game: 'Revived Forest' is a 2d platform game. The main goal is to collect all the seeds and save the offspring of the ents. Only one surviving Ent, who must save the future of all Ents. Get all the seeds and give hope for the future. Just be careful there are many orcs and lumberjacks in the forest! Everyone strives to chop you for firewood. Sleight of hand and ingenuity are your best friends! Game Features: Dynamic music Challenging levels Steam Achievements support Nice pixel-art visuals
